# Math-Gen

> Elementary school math exercise generator. Create printable math worksheets for addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and comparison exercises.

## About

Math-Gen is a free, open-source web application that generates customizable math exercises for elementary school students. Teachers and parents can use it to create printable practice worksheets.

## Features

- Simple arithmetic exercises (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
- Missing number exercises (find the missing operand)
- Comparison exercises (greater than, less than, equal to)
- Long-form exercises (multi-digit addition, subtraction, multiplication)
- Multiplication table practice
- Customizable difficulty settings (number ranges, exercise count)
- Multi-language support (English and Hebrew)
- Print-friendly output
- Mobile-responsive design

## Links

- [Website](https://math-gen.com/)
- [Source Code](https://github.com/drehelis/math-gen)
